name.ja: <ruby>阿<rt>あ</rt></ruby><ruby>修<rt>しゅ</rt></ruby><ruby>羅<rt>ラ</rt></ruby>のサイコロ

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster face-up.

effect.en: Roll a six-sided die. Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the result] x 100, and all face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose ATK/DEF equal to [the result] x 100 until the end of this turn. Then, you can make all face-up monsters on your field gain ATK/DEF equal to [the result] x 100 until the end of this turn.
